alert.note: Alert for Buckeye, Avondale; Northwest Pinal County; Sonoran Desert Natl Monument; West Pinal County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 18 at 7:32PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Maricopa and Pinal Counties through 815 PM MST... At 731 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking an outflow boundary associated with a line of showers extending from 7 miles southeast of Estrella Mountain Park to near Estrella Sailport to 10 miles northwest of Chui-Chu to near Toltec to near La Palma. Movement was southwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Casa Grande, Coolidge, Maricopa, Estrella, Arizona City, La Palma, Toltec, Big Horn, Coolidge Airport, Freeman, Estrella Sailport, Olberg, Arizola, Sonoran National Monument, Randolph, Blackwater, Valley Farms, Mobile, Stanfield and Ak-Chin Village. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 178 and 204. AZ Interstate 8 between mile markers 135 and 178. AZ Route 87 between mile markers 124 and 143. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Buckeye, Avondale; Northwest Pinal County; Sonoran Desert Natl Monument; West Pinal County
